title: Summer Friday '19: Episode 2
description:
Late Night writers Ally Hord and Mike Scollins interview Amber Ruffin in their new podcast segment, Late Night Legends of Comedy.

Then, hear some summer reading recommendations from Ann Beattie, Jason Mantzoukas and John Waters.

Finally, Late Night writer Ben Warheit and field producer Amanda Cowper debate the merits of consuming entertainment week-to-week versus binging in one sitting.
